title: Bloomberg Markets: Twitter Shows Renewed User Growth
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Twitter Shows Renewed User Growth
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Selina Wang\u0010Global Technology Reporter\u0010Bloomberg News \u0010Discussing Twitter beating sales estimates and adding more monthly users, indicating signs of life at the social network that has struggled to attract new consumers and advertisers. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
